title: Moroccan tourist delegation feels upbeat about Abu DhabiTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Moroccan tourist delegation feels upbeat about Abu Dhabi
Abu Dhabi: According to a delegation of travel industry leaders on a recent trip to Abu Dhabi, the emirate has the potential to become a leading tourism destination from Morocco.
Citing a combination of first-class infrastructure, top-class accommodation, an extensive array of attractions for the family and impressive air access, the Moroccan tour operators believe the emirate can gain a larger share of outbound travel from their country.
The 10 member-strong trade delegation, guests of TCA Abu Dhabi and Etihad Airways, visited many of the emirateâ€™s top attractions on their four-day visit.
